text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ahem～ To our preparation's success 'n that of the Threading of Memories ——

text_block_list.name: All Together
text_block_list.text: To success!!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Grand idea of ya to have a kickoff party though. Fer sure, we ain't lackin' in unity this way!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ain't it～? When I looked at "stand together" literally, I went 'n thought, why not gather 'round, eh? Share some chow. Figured there's no better way to build unity.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: A'ight then, lemme step up as organizer to kick off this "Pray for Unity! Squid 'n Maybe Meat!" affair!!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: —— Rahrahrahrahrahrahrahrahrah～～!! Huphuphuphuppayaa～～!! Nwooooah!!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Such dexterity…! 'Tis like a lightning bolt! One blinks and another takoyaki appears…!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Going molasses nonetheless! We got Tracen's famed glutt'nous monster here, y'know!?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Tama's takoyaki…… I can't wait……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Hehe. The meat is done over here meanwhile, if you would like to partake.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: If the meat's done then it's yakisoba time! I'll give y'all a good show of my skills from workin' at a food stall!!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Oooh……! It's just like a festival……!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: A'ight, 'bout time we got eating!! Oh 'n control yourself will you, Oguri! Leave us all some chow!!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I… I'll try……!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: You Oguri's mommy or what, Tama!? No overeatin' or usin' fingers at the table, kiddos?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Who ya callin' mommy!?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Being here with everyone, sharing a meal… it's so lively, so joyous. It certainly lifts your spirits, does it not?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Truly, 'tis a refreshing change of pace. I thank you for your suggestion, Tamamo.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Haha, it's naught! Just doing my thing 'n you folk went tagging along, so gratitude's all my side.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: You been takin' the lead a lot since learnin' about the Sacred Equine Relay, haven'tcha? Got me wonderin' a bit why you've been so enthusiastic about it.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Where you pulling that from, all the sudden? …… Well it ain't much big, just a li'l something personal, see.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Know how's they say Sacred Equines are a source of luck for competing horsegirls? ……All I want's to snag a piece of that for my races, playin' the part and whatnot.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: —— I'm jus' looking to win heaps'a races going forward. Keep rakin' in wins… 'n grab my dreams by the tail!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ain't enough to grind myself into the ground for that…… Gotta snatch up every bit of luck, fate, anything I can.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …… Tha's why I wanted to be a Sacred Equine s'well. If this experience can lead t'any victories in the future ——

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: I'm going all in on that. Snatch any chances that pop up… 'n win. Plain 'n simple.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: … A genuine desire, I see. I have come to understand, Tamamo, just where your strength and conviction come from.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Whoa now, got me blushin' here! Anyhow, enough 'bout me. Let's tidy up 'n get ready for tonight's group practice!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Hold it! Ya can't just drop all that on us an' scram! Gotta round off properly, don'tcha think?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Round off…? Yeah, my belly's definitely gotten rounder……

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Da-ha-ha! That ain't it, Oguri. I mean round off the party, by roundin' up. Gotta huddle! Stand together! In a circle! Unity!!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Hahahh! I see whatchu mean, swell idea! A'ight, gather 'round, friends!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: We're gonna make this Relay a success!! Here goes—!!

text_block_list.name: All Together
text_block_list.text: One! Two! Yeeeeeaaaahh!!
In that mood the days passed at preparation camp ——

text_block_list.name: All 3
text_block_list.text: Huaeeeh ——

text_block_list.name: Oguri & Ardan
text_block_list.text: Haaaaaaaaaaaaaah!!!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: That's the spirit, both a' ya!! Let it all out!!

text_block_list.name: All 3
text_block_list.text: "Those who tread upon a path veiled to all, from eras bygone to the now, now to the hereafter. In prayer for blessings may you find at its end, we, in this moment, hearts uncountable entwine."

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: …… I did it! I got it right without stuttering!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Heck yeah! We got naught to fear from this presentation now! Pres. Mukai's gonna be in for a surprise!
—— The girls subsequently faced the midway presentation.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: —— Good work on making this presentation, you all. I shall now share my current impressions with you.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: First of all… I must say you have made it remarkably far in this short period of time. I can certainly sense the extraordinary amount of effort you all have put in.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: You have most definitely reached the standard expected of you at this point. That is all the more reason I must advise you ——

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: As you are now, you will not be able to fulfil your duties as Sacred Equines.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Huh……!?
